name: Zoop To The Future! - A Time Travelin', Point-n-Click Adventure Game for PC/Mac/iPad!
blurb: A hilarious PC game that takes Prickley Pete, a ghost, to multiple times periods and locales to solve puzzles!

rewards.reward: Executive Producer Credit in the Finished Game + A copy of "Zoop To The Future" on PC or Mac
Executive Producer Credit in the Finished Game + A copy of "Zoop To The Future" on PC, Mac, or iPad + A set of three (3) "Zoop To The Future!" stickers!

Executive Producer Credit in the Finished Game + A copy of "Zoop To The Future" on PC (Plus Zune HD) or XBOX 360 + A "Zoop To The Future!" sticker + A set of three (3) Prickley Pete, Joey, and Danny pins + A copy of "The Somewhat Comical Adventures of Prickley Pete!" Season 1 on DVD!

Executive Producer Credit in the Finished Game + A copy of "Zoop To The Future" on PC, Mac, or iPad + A set of three (3) "Zoop To The Future!" stickers + A copy of "The Somewhat Comical Adventures of Prickley Pete!" Season 1 on DVD + A Prickley Pete Plush Doll!

Executive Producer Credit in the Finished Game + A copy of "Zoop To The Future" on PC, Mac, or iPad + A set of three (3) "Zoop To The Future!" stickers! + A set of three (3) Prickley Pete, Joey, and Danny pins +  A copy of "The Somewhat Comical Adventures of Prickley Pete!" Season 1 on DVD + A Prickley Pete Plush Doll!

Executive Producer Credit in the Finished Game + A copy of "Zoop To The Future" on PC, Mac, or iPad + A set of three (3) "Zoop To The Future!" stickers! + A set of three (3) Prickley Pete, Joey, and Danny pins + A copy of "The Somewhat Comical Adventures of Prickley Pete!" Season 1 on DVD + A Prickley Pete Plush Doll + A copy of the "Zoop To The Future" Soundtrack + A Free "Zoop To The Future!" T-Shirt! + A chance to have your likeness featured in the game!  (One person from this tier will be randomly selected)

Executive Producer Credit in the Finished Game + A copy of "Zoop To The Future" on PC, Mac, or iPad + A "Zoop To The Future!" sticker + A set of three (3) "Zoop To The Future!" stickers! + A copy of "The Somewhat Comical Adventures of Prickley Pete!" Season 1 on DVD + Three (3) Prickley Pete Plush Dolls + Two (2) Copies of the "Zoop To The Future" Soundtrack + 2 Free "Zoop To The Future!" T-Shirts + Limited Edition Packaging! + A chance to have your likeness featured in the game!  (One person from this tier will be randomly selected)
EVERYTHING! + Your likeness and, if you want, your voice featured in the finished game!
